meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plush.
meanings.sent1: The plushnesses of the sofa made it very comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: I love the plushnesses of this blanket; it's so soft and cozy.
meanings.sent3: The plushnesses of the teddy bear's fur made it the envy of all the other toys.
meanings.sent4: The plushnesses of the velvet curtains added a touch of luxury to the room.
meanings.sent5: The plushnesses of the carpet felt like walking on a cloud.

meanings.sent1: She admired the plushnesses of the velvet dress in the store window.
meanings.sent2: The store specialized in selling various plushnesses for upholstery.
meanings.sent3: The plushnesses of the pillow made it the perfect place to rest your head.
meanings.sent4: The plushnesses of the stuffed animals in the toy store were so huggable.
meanings.sent5: The plushnesses of the robe made her feel like royalty.
